title: hello-world.md
content:
## Welcome to my little blog!

This is my very first post. I wanted to create something that felt a bit more personal and nerdy than a standard blog template.

Here, you can navigate my thoughts using familiar commands. Try typing `help` to see what you can do. It's simple, but I at least think it's neat.

This page is mainly for myself to jot down spurious thoughts, but who knows, maybe someone takes a smidgen of interest in something I have to say.

Regardless, I hope you enjoy your stay.

-- Ryan
